about_the_game:
Almost two hours of chilled beats straight from Weedcraft Inc, grinded and rolled by some of the top Polish hip hop producers.

DJ Eprom - a legendary producer, DJ, turntablist rapper and mastering engineer, known for his collaboration with a variety of acclaimed Polish artists, even outside hip hop.

ES.CE - a young master of relaxed beats, often with soft low-fi touches. Known for his work with one of the most recognised Polish rappers - L.U.C.

DJ BRK - not only a producer, but also a rapper and sound engineer. Often collaborates with Jarecki and Grubson. Co-author of the famous “Gruby Brzuch” album.

Opiat - an unpredictable artist of many faces, in love with diverse, surprising sounds. Collaborates with a young star of Polish hip hop named Kuba Knap

Sztigar Bonko - a mysterious rapper and producer, who’s said to be a real miner working somewhere in Silesia. He grew up chewing coal and listening to Cypress Hill which resulted with his unique interpretation of his West Coast masters.

Bonus tracks! Music from the Freedom Update and special vocal singles by rappers Sahtyre and Rosko Lewis.

Now that you’re a connoisseur of Polish hip hop, lean back, relax and hit “Play” to enjoy these amazing tracks. Includes high quality MP3 and FLAC files.

name: Weedcraft Inc Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 199 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1165 MB available space
